content: I like the idea of renting a private villa or a large house. It would be great to have a home-away-from-home where we can all relax and be together. Since my aunts, uncles, and cousins, some of whom I hadn't seen in years, had a great time catching up at the recent family reunion, I think a private villa would be perfect for our family trip. Do you have any suggestions on how to find the right property and what to consider when booking?
